titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Julius Robinson beneficiary membership certificate from the Knights of Honor Lodge No. 2115 1977.218
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:16:39 +0000.

did.unittitle: Julius Robinson beneficiary membership certificate from the Knights of Honor Lodge No. 2115

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Knights of Honor. Lodge No. 2115 (New York, N.Y.)

did.abstract: One certificate, dated 1880, stating that Julius Robinson has achieved the "Degree of Manhood" and is a beneficiary member of the Supreme Lodge of the Knights of Honor, a fraternal organization. The certficate is given under the seal of the Knights of Honor Lodge No. 2115, New York City.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Julius Robinson beneficiary membership certificate from the Knights of Honor Lodge No. 2115, 1977.218, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. Formally accessioned in 1977.
